sourcesContent:
import React, { memo, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "../CSS/infobar.css"; import "../App.css"; interface infoBarprop { genClass: String; name: String; steps: string[]; remind: null | Date; duedate: null | Date; repeat: null | { freq: String; on: [String] }; note: String; createdOn: null | Date; important: boolean; } function Infobar({ genClass, name, steps, remind, duedate, repeat, note, createdOn, important, }: infoBarprop) { const crossimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-cross.png"); const starON = require("../Images/task-star-On.png"); const starOff = require("../Images/task-star.png"); const myDaySun = require("../Images/infobar-myDaySun.png"); const alarmimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-alarm.png"); const latertodayimg = require("../Images/infobar-latertoday.png"); const tomorowimg = require("../Images/infobar-tomorow.png"); const nextweekimg = require("../Images/infobar-nextweek.png"); const calenderimg = require("../Images/rightsidebar-calender.png"); const repeatimg = require("../Images/task-repeat.png"); const deleteimg = require("../Images/infobar-delete.png"); const threelines = require("../Images/sidebar-horizontallines.png"); const addtolist = require("../Images/infobar-addtolist.png"); const days = ["Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"]; const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Nov", "Dec", ]; const today = new Date(); const [infobardynamicWidth, setwidth] = useState("390px"); const [remindmemenu, setremindmemenu] = useState(false); const [duedateMenu, setduedatemenu] = useState(false); const [repeatmenu, setrepeatmenu] = useState(false); const [addtolistMenu, openaddtolistmenu] = useState(true); duedate = duedate ? new Date(duedate) : null; remind = remind ? new Date(remind) : null; createdOn = createdOn ? new Date(createdOn) : null; return (
Delete List
Change Name
{ infobardynamicWidth === "0px" ? setwidth("390px") : setwidth("0px"); }} >
{name}
Add to My Day
{ setremindmemenu(true); }} >
Remind me {remind ? `at ${remind.getHours()}:00` : ""}
{remind ? `${days[remind.getDay()]}, ${remind.getDate()} ${ months[remind.getMonth()] } ` : ""}
Later Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${ days[today.getDay() + 1] }, ${today.getHours()}:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{ setremindmemenu(false); }} >
{ setduedatemenu(true); }} > {duedate ? `${days[duedate.getDay()]}, ${duedate.getDate()} ${ months[duedate.getMonth()] }` : "Add a due date"}
Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${days[today.getDay() + 1]}, 22:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{ setduedatemenu(false); }} >
{ setrepeatmenu(true); }} > {repeat ? `${repeat.freq}` : "Repeat"}
{repeat ? `${repeat.on.join(", ")}` : ""}
Daily
Weekdays
Weekly
Monthly
Yearly
Custom
{ setrepeatmenu(false); }} >
{createdOn ? `Created on ${createdOn.getDate()} ${ months[createdOn.getMonth()] }` : ""}
); } export default memo(Infobar);
